Hi! I am Bijay K Pathak and welcome to my corner in the Internet. I am currently working as Software/Data Engineer in Nike. I graduated from Michigan Tech in 2014 with M.Sc. in Computer Science and Engineering with focus on machine learning and optimization. I am interested in data intensive application, functional programming and distributed system.
